title: Account Coordinator/ admin
job_overview:
We are looking for an Administrative Assistant to support our Account Coordinators and keep things moving smoothly behind the scenes.

We need someone sharp, reliable, and experienced in the facility management industry. You should know the pace, the language, and the pressure of this field—because we move fast and expect our team to be a few steps ahead.

???? What You’ll Be Doing:
Assisting Account Coordinators with scheduling, data entry, and follow-ups

Keeping client records organized and up-to-date

Supporting work order management and vendor communications

Helping track deadlines, client requests, and project progress

? What We’re Looking For:
Must have experience in the Facility Management or Construction industry (this is not a general admin role)

Strong organizational skills and attention to detail

Great communicator – written and verbal

Self-starter who can manage multiple priorities in a fast-paced environment

???? Video Introduction Required:
To be considered, you must submit a short video (1-2 minutes) introducing yourself and sharing why you’re a great fit for this role.
Applications without a video will not be reviewed.
